title: NBA 2K16 Video - NBA Season Sizzle (Shady00018)
text: Shady is a bad man Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk # 2 wallofhate @ 10/19/15 09:15 AM Wow just wow # 3 wallofhate @ 10/19/15 09:20 AM If they made that a commercial for the game it'd sell another 4 million copies. # 4 Noonie13 @ 10/19/15 10:33 AM MEAN+VICIOUS # 5 Gosens6 @ 10/19/15 10:35 AM Bruh.... Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk # 6 daveberg @ 10/19/15 10:58 AM Shady is by far and away the GOAT of 2k videos. # 7 richmo @ 10/19/15 11:00 AM I wish the audio/commentary was really like that. # 8 WISports @ 10/19/15 11:08 AM Shady does it again.
